actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require preseparation counseling for members of the reserve components upon their retirement or separation from service.
short_title: Equal Access to Preseparation Counseling Act

summary.text: Equal Access to Preseparation Counseling Act - Requires the Secretary of the military department concerned to provide individual preseparation counseling for each member of the reserves whose discharge or release from service is anticipated as of a specific date. (Under current law, such counseling must be provided only to a member of the Armed Forces whose discharge or release from active duty is anticipated as of a specific date.)

titles.title: Equal Access to Preseparation Counseling Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to require preseparation counseling for members of the reserve components upon their retirement or separation from service.
